title: IBM Cloud Developer Tools CLI
introduction: Use IBM Cloud's powerful CLIs and tooling to interact with your applications, containers, infrastructure, and other services

links.title: Getting started with the IBM Cloud CLI
links.description: Install the IBM Cloud Command Line Interface, along with the option to install popular plug-ins and tools so that you can work with apps.

links.title: IBM Cloud CLI commands
links.description: IBM Cloud CLI commands to create, manage, deploy, debug, and test applications.

links.title: Extending IBM Cloud CLI with plug-ins
links.description: IBM Cloud CLI supports a plug-in framework to extend its capability. Install a plug-in from a repository, a URL, or install a plug-in binary locally.

links.title: Getting started with IBM Cloud Shell
links.description: IBM Cloud Shell is a cloud-based shell workspace that's preconfigured with the full IBM Cloud CLI and several plug-ins and tools.

links.title: Troubleshooting for the IBM Cloud CLI
links.description: See solutions to common problems with using the IBM Cloud Command Line Interface.

links.title: Release notes and downloads for the IBM Cloud CLI
links.description: See the release notes, and download the installers and binaries for the IBM Cloud CLI.

section_highlights.title: Db2 Optimization Techniques for SAP Database Migration to the Cloud
section_highlights.description: This IBM Redbook provides in-depth recommendations for the source system database export.
